about_the_game:
“The mist city”is a special outstanding work of suspense and escape.In this work, you will play a calm and wise girl, participating in a competition of love and betrayal.
This is a work of survival unfolded in the mysterious empty city.You fell into the river by accident because of a mysterious force. Wake up and find yourself in a foggy empty city and meet 12 people who are similar to you.
In the game, you need to escape the chase and identify the lies through dialogue. Try to find out the truth, and finally escape from the empty city.
The content of the game is real and intense, which brings in a strong sense. Playability is high, players can not miss a good game!
"Strong logicality": the logic of the story is closely linked, and players need to seriously consider the details of each game.
"Butterfly effect setting": Every choice may have a huge impact on the long story.
"Exquisite pictures and music": contains a large number of exquisite self drawn CG, as well as the right soundtrack. So that every player can experience a unique audio-visual experience.
"The huge branch line": a lot of branch plots, you can get unexpected gains ~
